name: TheCaveCaveCave
description:
This is our entry for the  BenBonk Game Jam #2. The theme was limited space.
Try to get out of the cave by walking, jumping and various styles of climbing.
You can climb some walls, some roofs and narrow chimneys.

Art by https://the-nush.itch.io/
Music by https://destin715.itch.io/

Controls:
A/D left/right
W hold on to
SPACE jump
ESCAPE restart
